summary: An ordinance relating to the improvement of East Prospect Street and certain other streets and avenues, by paving, etc., as authorized by Ordinance No. 81219, creating Local Improvement District No. 6018; reducing the assessment levied therefor on Lots 17, 18 and 19, Block 20, Replat of John J. McGilvra's 3rd Addition; and accepting the offer of payment of said reduced assessment.
